Title: Stalking the Stalker
Description:
If dis loa be huntin' here, he may have seen us already. Since we don't know for sure, let's split up.

I be hunting for him, while ya get his attention. Jani says the loa has been taking the offerings meant for Hakkar, the loa of blood. 

But we don't know WHY. Collect some and see if he wants them. If his motive is something else... we be knowin' soon enough.
ObjectivesText: Collect 6 Offerings to Hakkar to attract the loa.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Find the missing loa in Zul'Gurub.
